notes.title: HELLO
notes.text:
Assignment ---   1  --   hobbes enabled -   3-4 hrs  
Fork -> clone into local machine
Open the cloned folder in vs Code
Open terminal and type: npm install
Complete the coding
Test the code : ng test/ npm run test 
If all test cases passes locally
Push the code to gitlab
And test it in hobbes --  
99  >=70

notes.title: Test Title
notes.text:
Reduce tight coupling between objects  ---  loose coupling

HttpCllient class ---  get,post -- can used to interact RestApi

Json-server --  node rest api application --  can be used to perform CRUD operations on any json file .
Json-server <json filename>  ---  posts, users,favourite

Json file  ---   to persists the data
